about.subtitle: about us
about.description: Wombat Technology is a software development company that specializes in web service and native application development including UI/UX design. We don't just build them, we identify the essential issues of the users and help them to solve those issues with the right technology

service.subtitle: service
service.description: From web application to native application development in any language or framework. We take care of app and web service development including design.

app.title: app development
app.description: We plan and develop smartphone apps.
